name: Dino the Explorer
description:
Dino the Explorer - a platformer game about... dinosaur collecting apples...

Yep! Literally! My first game, what do you except? I was just learning DEFOLD engine! Uploaded for memories in future

... I might use this Dino in future agian, he's cool

Keybinds: A, Left Arrow - Move Left D, Right Arrow - Move Right Space, Up Arrow - Jump (Double jump in air) Open-Source things I used: https://nyknck.itch.io/fx062 https://alexs-assets.itch.io/16x16-rpg-item-pack https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters https://anokolisa.itch.io/basic-140-tiles-grassland-and-mines
